text: Yasartha jasale imana lya'eka chan ra satkarma gareka chan, usale tinala'i pura pratiphala pradana garnecha ra aphno krpale aru badhi nai pradana garnecha ra jasale apamana thane ra ghamanda gare, tinala'i kastadayaka sajaya dinecha ra yiniharule allaha baheka kasaila'i aphno samarthaka ra sahayogi pa'umne chainan
